Frames¶

Note

This class is not intended for use by those using Pika in their applications. This documentation is for those who are extending Pika or otherwise working on the driver itself.

Applications using Pika will primarily interface with it via a channel object.

class frames.Frame(frame_type, channel_number)¶
class frames.Method(channel_number, method)¶
class frames.Header(channel_number, body_size, props)¶
class frames.Body(channel_number, fragment)¶
class frames.ProtocolHeader(major=None, minor=None, revision=None)¶
